description: The scene depicts two distinct indoor environments. In the upper level, figures are engrossed in watching a television which displays a remarkably detailed, large face wearing glasses. Below, one figure sits with binoculars while another stands by a window peering intently through a telescope mounted on a tripod. This observation activity, performed indoors with optical equipment, is so compelling that it interrupts discussions about neighbors. The surreal television content contrasts with the focused, albeit unusual, telescopic viewing.
caption: Say, Carl ... forget the Hendersons for a second and come look at this thing.
